entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
